meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Chris Gaiman Loren Gianini Greg Buzzard Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6686.

td.p: Chris Gaiman, a post-production coordinator originally from Slatington, Pennsylvania
Loren Gianini, a clinical psychology research fellow originally from West Hartford, Connecticut
Greg Buzzard, an organizing fellow originally from Warrensburg, Missouri (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,000)

tr.td: CURRENT EVENTS
3-SYLLABLE WORDS
AGRICULTURE
FIRST NAME'S THE SAME
EX-WORLD LEADERS
THE USO

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'the Japanese earthquake (or tsunami)

Greg
')
div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Sarah of the Clue Crew delivers the clue from Alaska.) Flotsam ranging from small toys
to a 200-foot squid trawler began washing up on Alaska\'s shores
months after this March 2011 event')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
(Sarah of the Clue Crew delivers the clue from Alaska.) Flotsam ranging from small toys
to a 200-foot squid trawler began washing up on Alaska's shores
months after this March 2011 event

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex [after reading Greg\'s response]: Greg, as you know, we normally don\'t penalize you if you misspell a word; but in this particular case, you have changed the pronunciation of the country. So it is incorrect, and it will cost you $6,600; you\'ll finish in second place.)
LorenWhat is Ukraine?
$4,000
ChrisWhat is Kazakhstan?
$4,701
GregWhat is Kazkhistan?
$6,600
Kazakhstan')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In area, it\'s the largest former Soviet republic after Russia & the largest nation that doesn\'t border an ocean')

tr.td: BIG COUNTRIES
In area, it's the largest former Soviet republic after Russia & the largest nation that doesn't border an ocean
Greg
Loren
Chris
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $14,401
Greg
Loren
Chris

(including 1 DD),

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
